description: CUSI is a food company dedicated to producing allergen-free products, founded by food engineers motivated by their daughter's milk protein intolerance. With around 20 products, they primarily export to markets like Colombia and the USA, focusing on gluten-free and organic offerings. CUSI collaborates closely with small producers, providing training and support to enhance their products' value. Their commitment to sustainability and regenerative agriculture aims to foster healthier food systems while addressing dietary needs.
name: CUSI
